comment: She's a low IQ import gold digger who still cannot speak proper English after all those years. She's also got tons of makeup on all the time and her face looks like a Botox experiment gone horribly wrong.
amr:
# ::snt She's a low IQ import gold digger who still cannot speak proper English after all those years. She's also got tons of makeup on all the time and her face looks like a Botox experiment gone horribly wrong.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (d / dig-01
                  :ARG3 (g / gold))
            :ARG0-of (s / speak-01
                  :ARG3 (l / language
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "English"))
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :mod (s2 / still)
                        :time (a / after
                              :quant (y / year
                                    :mod (t / that)
                                    :mod (a2 / all)))))
            :domain (s3 / she)
            :ARG1-of (l2 / low-04
                  :ARG2 (q / quotient
                        :quant-of (ii / intelligent-01))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (m2 / makeup
                  :quant (t2 / ton)
                  :time (t3 / time
                        :mod (a4 / all))
                  :mod (a5 / also))
            :op2 (l3 / look-02
                  :ARG0 (f / face
                        :part-of (s4 / she))
                  :ARG1 (e / experiment-01
                        :ARG1 (b / Botox)
                        :ARG1-of (g2 / go-08
                              :ARG2 (w / wrong-04
                                    :ARG1 e
                                    :mod (h / horrible)))))))
